Content

collectif is not responsible or liable in any manner for any Content posted on our Website or in connection with our Services, whether posted or caused by ANON Author of our Website, or by collectif.

Although we provide rules for Anon Author conduct and postings, we do not control and are not responsible for what Anon Author post, transmit or share on our Website or Services, and are not responsible for any offensive, inappropriate, obscene, unlawful or otherwise objectionable content you may encounter on our Website or Services.

collectif is not responsible for the conduct, whether online or offline, of any user of our Website or Services.

Privacy & Security

We implement reasonable security measures to protect anonymous submissions. However:

  • We cannot guarantee absolute anonymity
  • Users are responsible for their own operational security
  • We recommend using appropriate privacy tools and practices
  • We do not collect or store personally identifiable information
